scenarios.name: Catalog Placeholder 1 completes successfully
scenarios.given: the system is initialized and ready for Catalog Placeholder 1 operations
scenarios.when: a valid Catalog Placeholder 1 request is processed
scenarios.then: the operation completes without errors and emits success events

scenarios.name: Catalog Placeholder 1 handles failures gracefully
scenarios.given: the Catalog Placeholder 1 operation is in progress
scenarios.when: an unexpected error occurs during execution
scenarios.then: the system logs the error, emits failure events, and maintains consistent state

scenarios.name: Catalog Placeholder 1 records telemetry metrics
scenarios.given: telemetry collection is enabled for Catalog Placeholder 1
scenarios.then: duration, success/failure counts, and relevant metadata are recorded
